author: Staff Reporter
text:
Concerned about repeated instances of child trafficking, especially from families living on the city pavements, film actor R. Parthiepan submitted a petition to the Commissioner of Police on Monday seeking safety for this vulnerable section.

He also sought a thorough investigation to ensure culprits were brought to justice and stern action was taken against perpetrators.

The actor in his complaint stated that two children went missing from the city last month. Last year, the total number was 656, and 305 of them were girl children.

‘Grave concern’

“The figures might not be exact, but the fate of these missing children is of grave concern and officers need to take action to save them,” the actor stated in his petition.

He said that while on one hand Tamil Nadu was growing economically, these vulnerable groups continue to be the subjected to abuse and that it needs to stop.
title: Actor Parthiepan seeks probe into child trafficking
